name: The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide
about: What it is:A cushiony moisturizer with a whipped textured clinically shown to deliver up to 48 hours of explosive moisture and to recharge the skin barrier..Highlighted Ingredients:- Peptide: Visibly improves elasticity..What Else You Need to Know:A cushiony, whipped texture formula that provides long-lasting moisturization to dry skin and is formulated with two Napiers Formulas and better-for-you ingredients like peptide, ceramide, and squalane to help improve skin’s moisture barrier and skin elasticity. This moisturizer was dermatologically tested..Clinical Results:In a consumer study:
ingredients: -Peptide: Visibly improves skin’s elasticity..-Ceramide: Supports skin’s moisture barrier..-Squalane: Stabilizes skin’s moisture barrier and maintains hydration...Water/Eau, Glycerin, Cyclohexasiloxane, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Dipropylene Glycol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Triethylhexanoin, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Stearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing and toning, apply a dime-size (or desired) amount to your face with a gentle patting motion..-Can be used daily, AM and PM...Precautions:.-Discontinue use if irritation or a rash occurs. .-Consult a physician if irritation persists. .-Do not use on broken or damaged skin. .-Avoid eye area. .-Keep out of reach of children. .-Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight. .-For external use only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is excellent; it is non-irritating and provides a pleasant, comfortable feel.  The subtle fragrance is also quite agreeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super bummed by the new formulation of this product. This used to be my go to moisturizer I used for years. My skin loved it and it was the only moisturizer that wouldn’t break me out. Unfortunately the new formula breaks me out so bad. Ruined a good thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is amazing. It’s perfect for my skin because all the other moisturizers make my skin red, but this one cures the redness and makes it go away. It makes it my natural skin tone. It moisturizes so smoothly and clean. It's perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure why but my acne prone, oily skin did notttt like this moisturizer. Just heads up :)

reviews.review_title: If you’re thinking about it , don’t just buy it !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying so many moisturizer this has to be the best moisturizer!!! Especially for supper dry skin. My face has never felt better. I already finished my first bottle,I will be getting the bigger size:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve quite literally used this product for the past 8 years. It was my holy grail moisturizer. Not anymore since they changed the formula. It doesn’t moisturize my skin now and honestly just leaves me looking greasy yet dull. I’m going to use up the ones I’ve stockpiled and then never purchase again. Now the hunt begins for a replacement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this broke me out like crazy! The last time I used this product was a few years ago and I LOVED IT. Sounds like the formula has changed though so now this no longer works for me. I currently have 4 pimples on my neck (MY NECK), 2 on my face, and 2 on my chest. Awful. I won't be buying from belief anymore because of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it before makeup because not heavy, it’s super moisturizing but doesn’t fell greasy, it absorbs quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled with dry, flaky, skin for years, but this moisturizing bomb has been a total lifesaver. This cream is like a warm hug for my skin - it's soothing, nourishing, and leaves me feeling confident and radiant. The peptide and ceramide complex has genuinely transformed my skin's texture and appearance. I am forever grateful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product since 2016 when I bought it while in Korea. For the last few months it's been driving me crazy that I couldn't figure out what was giving me the worst breakouts of my life (I am not prone to facial acne); that is until I found recent reviews saying the formula changed. I am so incredibly disappointed that Sephora failed to mention such a significant formula change. Now I'm at a loss to find a new moisturizer AND have to go in store to return x 3 of these...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a basic moisturizer. The old formula felt thicker and most hydrating. This feels like the Laroche Posey ￼Double Moisturizer. It’s more suited for normal skin, not dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has done wonders for my combination skin. I have acne scarring from years ago, and this moisturizer has truly been plumping skin to help make the scars less noticeable. Very moisturizing too!

reviews.review_title: New Formula not good for Sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so irritating when companies reformulate their products & they are no longer as good as they used to be. I’ve been using this moisturizer for years & recently I’ve noticed it’s now making me break out right around the nose area. Unfortunately I will have to return this last bottle I bought and find an alternative. nose area

reviews.review_title: A must moisturizer in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for few weeks, my skin feels so shiny and smooth. Have got lot of compliments from my friends. It’s best to apply this at night before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this moisturizer a few years ago when I was on a journey to find cleaner products.  I love it.  My skin feels great all day.  Almost no scent.  Works in a drier climate.  And Sephora Clean.  Lasts a long time.   A favorite product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used them all for my dehydrated skin. Skinfix , honey halo, drunk elephant, tatcha, Paula’s choice, Sunday Riley ceo, inkey list peptide cream, cerave and cetaphil.  This is the only cream that keeps me hydrated for 8h. All the other creams leave me with a dry patch 3-4h later. Bonus, is that it’s not the most expensive cream and with the jumbo size, one of the cheaper ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow the formula has changed not same as before. I really loved this moisturizer I had been using it for 8 years but might have to change. Face doesnt feel hydrated for 24 hours like before what a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Need the old formula back this one makes my face feel oily after awhile had no issues at all with the old been using for years might have to stop buying :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My combination fair skin loves--and my bank account hates--the Tatcha Dewy Cream. This is a great alternative: It doesn't pill under makeup, no fragrance, doesn't cause breakouts, decent packaging. I will continue to splurge on Tatcha during winter though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the products I can’t live without and it keeps my face moisturized all day long!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the last few years and always loved it for my dry skin (the aqua bomb was too light for me). I have been using the new formula for the last month and it feels as though it is a lighter formula. If I used the old formula at night, my skin would feel moisturized for a full 24 hours if I didn't wash my face. Now, I wake up and my skin feels as though there is no product on my skin and is more dull looking.  For my dry skin, I will have to explore different options but the new formula may work for someone with normal to oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried many moisturizer to replace this one, but again and again, I come back to this one. I can’t stand fragrancy moisturizer that irritates my nose. I love the smell of this moisturizer. It has this clean botanical lemony smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate the new formula. It was so good. Why change it? I used to buy it religiously, but I’m being forced to find a new brand. The new formula sits on my skin and makes me break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the new formula is not worth it anymore. It doesnt feel like it actually goes INTO the skin it kind of just sits on top. The cooling sensation is barely there anymore. Its not as great for sensitive skin as I am noticing a little more redness after application. The old formula was my holy grail and I had been using it for almost 2 years :(( so sad, not sure what moisturizer to buy after this. Its not like horrible but its just not as amazing as the old formula.

reviews.review_title: Sensitive skin, beware! Honestly anyone beware
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For whatever reason, this makes the skin on my nose peel off. Like all day lol. I have highly tolerant skin, and have never poorly reacted to a product like I have with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s rich, hydrating cream ideal for dry combo skin. It absorbs well, leaving skin soft and plump without feeling greasy and making it suitable for both day and night use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The old one was a bit more oily and I always opted for Aqua Bomb instead. My skin feels nourished and moisturized without being oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to moisturizer.  I purchase the extra large size knowing I will get nice results.  Non greasy and sinks into skin.  Reliable moisturizer.  Always purchase while trying other moisturizers.  This is a no fail product for attaining moisture.

reviews.review_title: Please bring back the original formula!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used the OG formula for the last few years, so much that I hailed it my HG moisturizer – truly nothing compared to it. Unfortunately the new formula is irritating, does not feel or wear the same. Why the change?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the old formula for many years. This new formula makes my skin itch, is not hydrating and just sit on top of skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like bug spray and it's not hydrating enough. I bought it expecting it to be a good replacement for Cerave and it just couldn't do the job.

I’ve been buying this cream for months but after using it with the new formula I am no longer going to buy it. I started to have small rashes on my skin, they’re a little itchy and makes my skin feel bumpy. bumpy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rebought the value size more times than I can count. This moisturizer is in a class of its own. It’s SO GOOD for dry skin and my skin is always so plump and dewy when I use this. Sometimes I just use this instead of makeup and I get compliments. Seriously!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several years, and I loved it. I was hoping I wouldn't notice the difference with the new formula. Unfortunately, that's not the case. The old formula my skin felt moisturized all day. The new formula, my skin feels dry by midday and even gets flakey, and  I started getting breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best cream ever 100% would recommend and is worth it for me also is great for dry or combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about a month. It makes such a difference on my face by adding this product to my daily routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe they got rid of the old formula. I have sensitive skin and the old formula had oat in it, it was so soothing and I could be breaking out would wake up the next day face would be calmed and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years but unfortunately will have to find a new moisturizer as the new formula is awful. It is sticky, does not absorb, leaves your skin feeling greasy & causes redness. The original formula was perfect…so disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Devastated. Loved the old formula. Now that they’ve changed the formula, it stings my eyes after having it on for a bit. Loved the old formula, it was amazing. Not sure why they couldn’t have made this a new product line of its own. ? I see they’ve made same changes to their eye cream, which I’ve been obsessed with for years so I guess I’ll have to look for a new eye cream too. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended to use this product for my super dry skin, and I was a bit disappointed; it didn't seem to do much and didn't feel different than regular moisture, which is cheaper.

reviews.review_title: Super disappointed. Not the same formula.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered some makeup from a kbeauty website and received this as a sample and LOVED how crazy moisturizing it was for my super dry skin which many many many skin creams lack. Then I HAD to buy it and saw it was on Sephora and on sale. The formulas are NOTHING alike and it also has a scent to it when the original formula did not. This formula dries out my skin and it feels tight and sticky when it dries. I am giving it two stars because my face appears less red than how Tatcha products make my skin. I was looking forward to this but I am so disappointed. If you have super dry sensitive red skin try Dr. Jart  Cicapair™ Sensitive Skin Moisturizer for Redness. It helps tone down red and has a pretty decent moisturizing feeling. I have been using it for a month i bought another tube already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my favorite moisturizer of all time, but it has been reformulated and is very irritating for my skin now. So disappointing as I would have bought this for the rest of my life and I cannot find a replacement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this moisturizer since my normal one was out of stock. It worked well the first few days, and then it started drying out my face. I had rough dry patches everywhere. My face was red, tight and irritated. It would sting when I put it on. I had to stop using it and return. It was such a relief to go back to my regular moisturizer!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light and long lasting moisture. I really like that this product does not have any added fragrance. I have very skin and this product was not irritating at all. Over all a great product in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite moisturizer. It smells clean and doesn’t clog my pores or make my hormonal acne flare up. I have tempermental skin but it likes this stuff. Soaks in after maybe 5-10 minutes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best moisturizer I've ever had. I've been using it for about 2 years now and every time I try some new cream, I always come back to Belief.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail for at least 3-4 years. Super hydrating and I use it year round morning and night. For context I have sensitive/acne-prone/rosacea/eczema skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Belif products are my new obsession! Amazing ingredients with an actually affordable price. I'm tired of everything being $60+ an oz.. Speaking of amazing ingredients, ceramides and squalane?? I'm absolutely in! I use retinol and REQUIRE this deep, penetrative cream. I've also tried the aqua bomb which is more like a gel, the moisture bomb is a super luxurious creamy texture. I'm very acne prone and have oily skin, creams that don't clog my pores are INCREDIBLY hard to come by and I recommend this to all my lady friends. I have even gotten my husband to start using it, we noticed results around his crows feet immediately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Belif's Aqua Bomb Hydrating Gel is a game-changer for anyone seeking lightweight yet deeply hydrating skincare. Its gel texture feels refreshing upon application and absorbs quickly, leaving skin soft and supple without any greasy residue. Infused with Lady's Mantle, a herb known for its hydrating properties, this moisturizer delivers a burst of moisture that lasts all day. Perfect for all skin types, including sensitive skin, it's a must-have for achieving a dewy, revitalized complexion

reviews.review_title: I carry it in my bagg!! Its amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received something in exchange for this post. I absolutely love moisturizing bomb, I have been using it constantly everyday. It keeps my skin hydrated and moisturized and it keeps it moisturized the entire day. I carry it in my bag and reapply it as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! Not too heavy, and feels so nice on the skin. Doesn’t feel greasy either! I’ve used it as a hand lotion as my hands have been so dry lately, and it makes my hands feel much more moisturized and hydrated! The fragrance isn’t strong either and it smells so nice; a good clean calming smell! I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved having this moisturizer for a trip away for a week. I used it both day and night and my husband used it too. Was very moisturizing and calming on my very sensitive skin. Not too thick, and looked nice under makeup. Belif is so great for travel sized products!

reviews.review_title: Wears great by itself or under makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the true cream moisturizing bomb from Belif. It’s really lightweight and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t feel heavy and doesn’t leave a greasy film.  It’s great to wear by itself but also perfect under makeup. It doesn’t leave your makeup looking cakey. It is highly moisturizing. Love that it contains peptides, ceramides, and squalanes. It’s a wonderful moisturizer. Would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the smell, omg i adore it . I tried a very small size of it but I will be repurchasing the larger one now. I love everything about this moisturizer so far!. It’s extremely light-weight and non-greasy on the skin. I would definitely you recommend giving this a try (: perfect for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizer for Colder months/Dry skin type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never tried Belif Moisturizing Bomb so I can’t compare it with their old formulation but I really like the thick consistency of this moisturizer. I think this is perfect for the colder months, especially winter or if you have very dry skin type. But for me, since it is getting warmer, I will be using this when the weather is colder. But overall, definitely recommend ! Love the moisture it gives my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! It applies to my skin so easily and leaves me so hydrated. It layers so well with my makeup and my other skin care and doesn’t leave any pilling or any issues with my skin. Definitely a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so moisturizing! It does have a bit of a scent but it is not over whelming at all. Love the product on my skin. When applied at night I wake up with my skin feeling hydrated. I tried the small size and purchased the bigger size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and finding a moisturizer that keeps it looking hydrated has been hard. This Moisturizer lasts me pretty much all day. Without over doing it it’s just the right amount of moisture on your skin to make it look alive and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this moisturizer coz it doesnt hurt my skin, doesnt sting when i apply unlike the other one that i use, and it keeps my skin moisturized all day long! Its lightweight and the smell is not overpowering or overwhelming. Id totally purchase this and highly recommend it!!!

reviews.review_title: Belif in a true moisturizing bomb cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A true moisturizer bomb cream. I have been waking up to soft and supple skin every morning since I started using this moisturizer. Doesn’t break me out even though I have an oily combo skin. This might be a very good for winter months and a summer night time moisturizer. Belif true cream leaves skin plump and hydrated. Definitely been reaching out for this product more often. I will be checking out more products from Belif.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super happy to receive this moisturizing bomb for free! As someone who struggles with dry skin this is a must! I’m actually in between moisturizers, because I can’t really find one I love, but I’m definitely going to continue using this! It’s super moisturizing but very lightweight. A little bit goes a long way as well, you don’t need a lot to cover your whole face. It doesn’t leave a greasy residue and it sits beautifully under makeup. If you’re looking for a simple and effective face moisturizer, you definitely need to try this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is getting added to my daily routine. I have oily skin and struggle to find something will hydrate my skin without making it oily.  This product has been great the last two weeks I’ve been using it and helps my skin feel so good and look good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It’s light and not too heavy on the skin. It absorbs quickly and works well under makeup. I actually prefer this texture in the summer time versus the colder months. Will purchase for this summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received belief moisture bomb from belief  it’s nicely hydrating , it’s light hydration in my opinion not quite as thin for summer but not rich enough for the winter , nice product for in between seasons , I’m not sure yet how it performs under makeup but I’m exited to try , it didn’t burn my sensitive skin which is something I go through with new products so that was nice , I will be using it and recommending to friends with normal skin .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this moisturizing bomb for my nighttime skincare routine - it is slightly heavier than the aqua bomb but I think my skin needs more moisture at night. It doesn't feel greasy it feels more like a cream than gel texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this cream is what I need for spring and summer. I've been looking for such a light and astringent face cream for a long time. Gentle and light consistency, delicate aroma. My face feels moisturized and well-groomed after using it, which is a gift from the brand

reviews.review_title: Great addition to your summer skincare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Belif for grifting me your Moisturizing Bomb. I’ve really enjoy using this product. With the had weather arising I found that this product is super light weight and a great final step in your skincare routine. Not to mention all the amazing benefits for your skin. My new staple this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice and safe formula! I like this one but I don’t use it as much as the aqua bomb because my skin doesn’t necessarily need moisture as I have oily skin. It doesn’t break me out or anything which is good so this is safe for all skin types but I recommend it more for dry or combination skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very light moisturizer! The True Cream absorbs very well when applied on the skin keeping it hydrated. The scent gives off a clean smell which is not overpowering-I love! A little bit goes a long way too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Belif's Moisturizing Bomb is an excellent moisturizer that's easy to apply and leaves skin hydrated without residue. Its sleek packaging is practical and appealing, while its affordable price makes it accessible to all. A top choice for those seeking quality hydration at a great value. I received its sample product in exchange for this post

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not a bad moisturizing bomb, but have tried better. It is nice and lightweight, but not hydrating enough for my dry skin. I think it would work better on oilier skin types.  I personally am very dry and sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this moisturizer is the best thing ever. I have had flaky skin, dry skin, eczema, and everything under the sun. But what I love most is the explosion of moisture it brings to my skin. Even after just a few uses, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's overall hydration levels. It feels smoother, softer, and more radiant.  Plus, the added ingredients like peptide, ceramide, and squalane work wonders for improving the skin's moisture barrier and elasticity. My skin feels firmer and more resilient, with a healthy glow that I haven't seen in a long time.  Overall, the LG Beauty Belif Moisturizing Bomb is now a staple in my skincare routine. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the 10ml sample size of this product in exchange for my honest review. I was pleasantly surprised by the belif The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide. It combines everything I love about my favorite moisturizers into one product. Despite its lightweight feel, a little goes a long way, providing excellent hydration without leaving a greasy residue. It layers well with other skincare products and makeup, without causing pilling. My skin feels hydrated all day long, making it perfect for year-round use. I have combination skin with my chin being my most oily spot and the place where all my acne likes to hang out. Using this moisturizer didn’t cure my acne, but it didn’t irritate it or cause me to break out more which is all I can expect. It  has a light lemony smell that I really enjoy. It smells like just like their aqua bomb toner. All in all, I really enjoyed it and can see me purchasing this over and over again, especially for travel because I know it would work for me in different climates. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: It depends on your skin type!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Belif Moisturizing Bomb after hearing rave reviews about its hydrating properties. As someone with more oily skin, I was curious to see how it would work for me. While I can't deny its effectiveness in providing intense hydration, I found that the rich and creamy texture felt a bit too heavy on my skin.  Although the Moisturizing Bomb didn't quite suit my oily skin type, I can appreciate its nourishing formula, which left my skin feeling soft and moisturized without any greasiness. I found it worked better for me during the colder months when my skin tends to be drier.  In comparison to the Belif Aqua Bomb, which is specifically designed for oily and combination skin types, I personally found the Aqua Bomb to be a better fit for my skin. Its lightweight gel-cream texture provided the hydration my skin needed without weighing it down or exacerbating oiliness. The Aqua Bomb felt refreshing and absorbed quickly, making it ideal for daily use.  Overall, while the Belif Moisturizing Bomb didn't quite meet the needs of my oily skin, I can see how it would be a game-changer for those with dry to normal skin types seeking intense hydration. It's important to note that skincare is highly personal, and what works for one person may not work for another. If you have oily skin like mine, you might find the Belif Aqua Bomb to be a better-suited option for your daily moisturizing needs

reviews.review_text: As someone with dry and sensitive skin, finding the right moisturizer has been a journey. Firstly, the texture is luxurious yet lightweight, sinking into my skin effortlessly without leaving any greasy residue. This makes it perfect for both day and night use. Upon application, my skin immediately feels hydrated and plump, which lasts throughout the day.  I appreciate that it's formulated without harsh ingredients like parabens, sulfates, and phthalates, which can irritate sensitive skin. Instead, it's enriched with soothing herbs like comfrey leaf and oat extract, which help calm any redness or irritation.  One of the standout features for me is its ability to provide long-lasting hydration without clogging pores or causing breakouts. It's rare to find a moisturizer that strikes the perfect balance between nourishing dry patches and keeping oily areas in check, but belif Moisturizing Bomb does just that.  In terms of scent, it has a subtle herbal fragrance that dissipates quickly after application, making it suitable for those sensitive to strong scents.  Overall, belif Moisturizing Bomb has become a staple in my skincare routine. It's effective, gentle, and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable moisturizer, especially those with dry or sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past week, I’m liking the results of my skin. It feels really hydrating without being greasy, which is a huge plus for me. I have sensitive skin, and I found that it absorbed well and left my skin feeling plump and nourished. The addition of peptides and ceramides is a nice touch, and I definitely felt like it helped improve the overall texture and appearance of my skin.  I also appreciate that it comes in a jar, which makes it easy to get every last bit of product out. However, I know some people prefer pumps for hygiene reasons, so that's something to consider.  In terms of effectiveness, I noticed an improvement in my skin's hydration and overall softness after using this product consistently.  Overall, I'd say the Belif True Cream Moisturizing Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide is definitely worth a try if you're looking for a deeply hydrating moisturizer that also offers some added skincare benefits. If you're willing to splurge a little, it's a solid choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Title: A Hydration Marvel: Sephora belif Moisturizing Bomb Deluxe Sample Review  I recently had the pleasure of trying the Sephora belif Moisturizing Bomb Deluxe Sample, and I must say it left a lasting impression on my skincare routine. This petite 10ml powerhouse proved that good things do come in small packages.  First and foremost, the texture of the moisturizer is incredibly luxurious. The cream is velvety and smooth, gliding effortlessly onto the skin. Despite its richness, it doesn't feel heavy or greasy, making it suitable for various skin types.  What truly sets this moisturizer apart is its intense hydration. Packed with the belif's signature Napiers Aqua Formula, it delivers a surge of moisture that revitalizes and plumps the skin. After application, my skin felt instantly quenched, and the effects lasted throughout the day.  Another standout feature is the subtle, refreshing scent. The fragrance is mild and clean, providing a spa-like experience during application without being overpowering or irritating for those with sensitivities.  The deluxe sample size is perfect for those wanting to test the product before committing to the full-sized version. It's also travel-friendly, making it a great companion for on-the-go hydration.  In terms of packaging, the sample comes in a convenient and sanitary squeeze tube, allowing for precise control of the amount dispensed. The packaging is also visually appealing, reflecting the brand's commitment to a modern and clean aesthetic.  While the deluxe sample may not provide a complete assessment of long-term benefits, my initial experience with the Sephora belif Moisturizing Bomb was undeniably positive. If you're in search of a hydrating moisturizer that combines effectiveness with a touch of luxury, this miniature marvel is worth considering for your skincare arsenal.

reviews.review_text: This cream is great! It does exactly as it says, moisturizes! My skin felt super moisturizer after using only a little bit of product! It is a super light in consistency but super effective! Complimentary of belif

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Belif Moisturizing Bomb is a skincare essential that has earned its reputation for delivering intense hydration and nourishment. Having used this product for several weeks, I can confidently say it lives up to its promises. The texture of the moisturizer is luxuriously creamy, yet surprisingly lightweight. It effortlessly glides onto the skin, providing an immediate burst of moisture without feeling greasy. This makes it an excellent choice for those with combination or oily skin, as it effectively hydrates without clogging pores. One of the standout features of the Moisturizing Bomb is its impressive list of natural ingredients. The formula is enriched with comfrey leaf, a powerful herb known for its hydrating and soothing properties. This, coupled with oat extract and panthenol, creates a potent blend that not only moisturizes but also helps to strengthen the skin's barrier. I particularly appreciate the long-lasting effects of this moisturizer. Even in harsh weather conditions, my skin remained plump and supple throughout the day. It's a fantastic base for makeup application, as it creates a smooth canvas and prevents any patchiness. The product's packaging is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical. The jar is sturdy and allows for easy dispensing of the product without any mess. A little goes a long way, so despite the higher price point, the Moisturizing Bomb proves to be cost-effective in the long run. In terms of fragrance, the moisturizer has a subtle and refreshing scent that doesn't overpower. This is a plus for those with sensitive skin or those who prefer skincare products without strong fragrances. In conclusion, the Belif Moisturizing Bomb is a standout product that lives up to its reputation. It's a reliable choice for anyone seeking a high-quality moisturizer that delivers on hydration, nourishment, and overall skin health.

reviews.review_text: Belif True Cream Moisturizing Bomb is a skincare gem! Its rich, velvety texture deeply nourishes, leaving my skin feeling incredibly supple and hydrated. The formula is a powerhouse, providing long-lasting moisturization without any greasiness. I'm truly amazed by how my face feels – a perfect balance of moisture and comfort. This product has become a staple in my skincare routine, and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a revitalizing and indulgent experience.

After using the belif Moisturizing Bomb, my skin feels plump, smooth, and incredibly soft. It's the perfect base for makeup, too, as it creates a smooth canvas for application. If you're in need of a moisturizer that deeply hydrates and nourishes your skin, I highly recommend giving the belif Moisturizing Bomb a try. Your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_title: Permanent spot in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Certainly! Here's a positive review for belif’s The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide: --- I recently had the opportunity to try belif's The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide, which I received as a complimentary gift, and I must say, it's been a delightful experience. From the moment I opened the jar, I was impressed by the cream's luxurious texture. It's rich yet absorbs beautifully into the skin without leaving any greasy residue. The addition of peptides and ceramides in the formula really sets this cream apart. These ingredients have worked wonders for my skin, leaving it feeling deeply nourished and visibly more supple. I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's overall texture and hydration levels. Even during the harsh winter months, this cream has been a lifesaver, keeping my skin hydrated throughout the day. What I also love about this product is its gentle formulation. Despite having sensitive skin, I experienced no irritation. The scent is subtle and soothing, adding to the overall pampering experience. Overall, belif's The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide is a fantastic product. It's effective, luxurious, and a pleasure to use. I'm genuinely grateful for having been given the chance to try it for free, and it has certainly earned a permanent spot in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start with, I really like how light and creamy the texture is when first using the belif moisturizing bomb. I used it on both my neck and face and right away I could feel the difference. The skin is smoother and more supple. I also like that the scent is pleasant while being very subtle because certain skin products such as facial moisturizers just don't need a lot of scent. The packaging is extremely easy and convenient to use, which makes the experience all the better because sometimes the packaging can get messy after long use so the fact that it's this convenient really goes a long way.

reviews.review_text: If your skin is nitpicky, dry, sensitive and allergic to seemingly random things, and your countries customs can be annoyingly diligent, this cream is for you. Warm it up slightly between your fingers and spread it on with a light touch, don't be put off by the wood glue texture, it will liquify a bit. Wait a minute or two for it to sink in before applying the rest of your skincare and enjoy belif!

reviews.review_text: The LG Beauty Belif Moisturizing Bomb is a true cream moisturizer that comes with Oak Husk and Vitamin B, which is good for dry skin, dryness, dullness, and uneven texture for normal, dry skin types.  Moreover, this moisturizer provides 26 hours of intense, long-lasting moisture based on a clinical study.    This cushiony, whipped textured cream provides dry and dull skin with intense 26-hours of moisture, leaving the skin feeling refreshed.  Moreover, this moisturizer is blended with Belif’s signature Napier's Moisture Formula, and so this rich cream is ideal for balancing skin’s oil and water levels by minimizing excess oil production and providing deep moisture to the skin with soothing properties.  I have already recommended the LG Beauty Belif Moisturizing Bomb to many of my friends and family and several of them have already purchased and used this cream moisturizer and are absolutely happy to see the results, as this cushiony, whipped textured cream provided their dry and dull skin with intense 26-hours of moisture, leaving their skin feeling refreshed.
